oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Artillery, Infantry, Rifle, Dragoon, Cadet (1813-1816)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: This color plate is part of a series of plates created by the artist H.A. Ogden for the US Army to document the uniforms of the American soldier from the Revolution to 1888. Ogden completed most of his works by the mid 1880s. In this illustration we see various soldiers from the US Army has he appeared in the later half of the War of 1812.
